info.name: Zookeeper
info.attribution:
Coin image and board layout by ArnoldSmith86. Released to public domain under CC0. Animal images released under Pixabay License: https://pixabay.com/photos/maltese-dog-puppy-small-dog-1123016/ https://pixabay.com/photos/cat-kitten-pet-kitty-young-cat-551554/ https://pixabay.com/photos/wood-mouse-rodent-foraging-mouse-3082922/ https://pixabay.com/photos/bunny-rabbit-spring-baby-bunny-5014814/ https://pixabay.com/photos/cute-small-portrait-golden-hamster-3161014/ https://pixabay.com/photos/elephant-animal-safari-mammal-114543/ https://pixabay.com/photos/lion-lion-king-forest-king-lion-794962/ https://pixabay.com/photos/cow-alps-horn-759018/

Library image generated using the Midjourney artificial intelligence image generator, https://www.midjourney.com/home/, using the following prompt: "pride of lions watercolor painting --ar 1:1 --v 5.1"
info.description: Collect animal cards and play in order picked up. Trade cards to improve hand. Collect coins based on strength of play. Most coins at end of game wins.
